description: This file defines the ProductService class in a Java Spring application. It provides CRUD operations for Product entities, encapsulating repository calls, managing transactional boundaries, and handling not-found exceptions.

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Service layer class managing business logic for Product entities within a Spring application, providing methods for create, read, update, and delete operations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Product by saving it through the repository.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Product by its ID; throws ResourceNotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Product's details by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Product entity by ID.
